title: Tile, late 18th–early 19th century
medium: Earthenware, glazed and high fire decorated
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Kneeling figure, dressed in baggy trousers, jacket and pointed hat ending in a tassel; seen from the back and right. Chinoiserie type decoration.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tile, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Earthenware, glazed and high fire decorated. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1920-15-18.
